name: Second Soul
description:
Aphwoakah is very lonely, Aphwoakah wants to make friends. Help Aphwoakah find some friends, so Aphwoakah isn't lonely anymore.

Go on an epic journey across the valley in search of friends for Aphwoakah. 

Meet many unique, exciting potential friends. 

Encounter thrilling places in which friends may be found.

Use the W and D keys, or click and hold with the left cursor button to tell Aphwoakah where to go. Click on things to have Aphwoakah examine them.

If you enjoy this experience be sure to rate it, recommend it to your acquaintances or; leave a comment on what you appreciated along with any suggestions you may have for improvements.  Without this support it is very difficult for games to gain any kind of public attention.
